title: Manage Critical Spare Parts
description: A maintenance planner reviews the inventory of a critical spare part (e.g., a large motor for a mill) and ensures a spare is on hand.

tasks.description: Check the inventory level for the SAG mill motor in the warehouse management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows one spare motor is in stock.

tasks.description: Review the maintenance strategy, which specifies that one spare must always be held in inventory.
tasks.expected_outcome: The current inventory level is confirmed to be compliant with the strategy.

tasks.description: If a spare was used, create a high-priority purchase order to procure a new one with a long lead time.
tasks.expected_outcome: No action needed as a spare is on hand, but the process to reorder is confirmed.
